settings.title: Contact
settings.content: Submit a request for a repair, to attend a coffee class or reach out with any questions. We may be able to answer your question immediately on our FAQ page. If not, drop us a line below.

settings.subtext: Our Support team is available Monday-Friday 8 a.m.- 4:30 p.m. ET
settings.contact_topics:
Question about my retail or subscription order
Question about my business Order
Question about my grocery purchase
Question about a PR request
Question about classes
General (all other questions)
